programme.title: Bakar S15 Ep05
programme.desc: Untuk episod kali ini, Adreena akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan Pic Gallette & Pic Crumble Pie.

programme.title: Ronda Roda S4 Ep07
programme.desc: Ronda Roda kali ini, menampilkan kereta Volvo, Club House Art Of Speed (Chaos) dan Skyline GTR R34. Yang dihoskan oleh Mira Rizam dengan mempamerkan kereta baru dari Volvo C40 dan hasil tangan dari Asep Iskandar dan Syuk.

programme.title: Huru Hara S15 Ep05
programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Eriza, Hairi Safwan, Fikri Ibrahim dan Nabila Razali..

programme.title: Barajiwa Ep.2 Ep2
programme.desc: Uzair menyerang Madi dengan ganas. Madi dimasukkan ke hospital dalam keadaan koma, Uzair dihantar untuk pemulihan. Uzair menumpukan perhatian kepada SPM. Dia pergi untuk melindungi Ajeeb daripada Hatta yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pergaduhan. Imran membalas dendam terhadap Uzair dengan memanipulasi Asyikin untuk menjadi GRO.

programme.title: Seekers Underground Ep6
programme.desc: Seekers Underground menampilkan penyelidik paranormal dan jurugambar profesional, Syai yang akan bergandingan dengan Amir, seorang psikik yang mampu melihat dan berhubung dengan alam ghaib. Duo ini akan bekerjasama dengan ahli paranormal tempatan yang lain untuk mendapat akses ke tempat-tempat berhantu dan luar biasa di Malaysia.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu bersatu untuk memburu penipu terkenal yang diketahui mati, di tengah-tengah motif tersembunyi dan penipuan mereka.

programme.title: Awoken
programme.desc: Apabila tiada apa yang boleh dilakukan untuk pesakit Insomnia Fatal Familial di hospital, seorang pelajar perubatan telah menyuruh abangnya dipindahkan ke kemudahan rahsia di ruang bawah tanah untuk rawatan alternatif.

programme.title: Mumun
programme.desc: Mumun dan Juned adalah kekasih, tetapi Juned berasa sangat sedih setelah kehilangan Mumun dalam satu kemalangan yang mengerikan. Namun, orang yang menggali kubur lupa untuk menjalankan prosesi pengebumian Mumun dengan baik, dan sekarang Mumun bangkit dari kubur.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift 2
programme.desc: Kisah hidup Zack dan Sham penuh dengan konflik dan dendam. Zack, dahulu seorang pelumba haram, kini menjadi drifter profesional, sementara Sham terjejas selepas kemalangan. Ketibaan Aleeya dan dendam Joe memperumitkan lagi keadaan. Apabila Zack dan Aleeya berusaha melarikan diri daripada konflik, pertarungan memuncak sehingga membawa maut kepada Aleeya dan Joe. Keadaan ini menunjukkan bahawa meskipun penuh dengan kesulitan, kebaikan akhirnya berjaya menang atas kejahatan.

programme.title: Villa Nabila
programme.desc: Filem ini dibuat berdasarkan kisah sebenar yang berlaku di sebuah rumah abadoned di Johor bernama Villa Nabila. Pengarah Syafiq Yusof memilih untuk mempersembahkan filem itu dalam gaya dokumentari. Filem ini bermula dengan kehilangan seorang remaja di rumah. Syafiq menemu bual beberapa individu yang mendakwa pernah mengalami perkara ghaib di rumah itu dan menjadikan temu bual itu sebagai filem.

programme.title: Barajiwa Ep.2 Ep2
programme.desc: Uzair menyerang Madi dengan ganas. Madi dimasukkan ke hospital dalam keadaan koma, Uzair dihantar untuk pemulihan. Uzair menumpukan perhatian kepada SPM. Dia pergi untuk melindungi Ajeeb daripada Hatta yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pergaduhan. Imran membalas dendam terhadap Uzair dengan memanipulasi Asyikin untuk menjadi GRO.

programme.title: Vengeance Of An Assassin
programme.desc: The Assassins' Code - Berpegang teguh pada misi. Jangan sekali-kali mengalihkan pandangan anda dari sasaran. Tidak menunjukkan belas kasihan. Natee (Dan Chupong) menjadi pembunuh kerana satu sebab- untuk mengetahui siapa yang membunuh ibu bapanya. Apabila dia semakin hampir untuk mendedahkan rangkaian rahsia kuasa dan rasuah, dia melakukan dua kali ganda dalam kerja, menjadikannya sasaran dan meletakkan semua orang yang dia sayangi dalam bahaya. Dikhianati, didedahkan dan diburu oleh pembunuh paling maut dalam perniagaan, kini Natee mempunyai kod baharu. Jadi lebih pantas. Lebih kuat. Pukul lebih kuat. Bertahan.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: Krew siri web seram pergi ke rumah puaka terbiar untuk siaran langsung. Mereka akan menemui sesuatu lebih daripada yang dijangkakan apabila mereka bergerak lebih dalam ke dalam bangunan lama yang mengerikan itu.

programme.title: Rambo Last Blood
programme.desc: John Rambo, setelah melawan iblisnya selama puluhan tahun, kini hidup dalam kedamaian di peternakan keluarganya di Arizona. Namun, ketenangannya terganggu ketika Gabriela, cucu dari pembantu rumahnya Mara, menghilang setelah menyeberangi perbatasan ke Meksiko untuk bertemu dengan ayah kandungnya. Rambo, yang telah menjadi figur ayah yang sejati bagi Gabriela selama bertahun-tahun, memulai perjalanan yang putus asa dan berbahaya untuk menemukannya.

programme.title: Karantina
programme.desc: Ia adalah filem seram tentang empat pelajar kolej yang pergi ke kem untuk mengambil gambar untuk membantu pelajaran mereka. Salah seorang daripada mereka tersesat dan bermulalah cerita.

programme.title: Guardian
programme.desc: Semasa Perang Dingin, sebuah organisasi yang dipanggil "Patriot" mencipta skuad superhero, yang merangkumi ahli-ahli beberapa republik Soviet. Selama bertahun-tahun, wira terpaksa menyembunyikan identiti mereka, tetapi dalam masa sukar mereka mesti menunjukkan diri mereka semula.

programme.title: Blood For Freedom
programme.desc: Semasa perang menentang komunis, seorang askar Thai mempertaruhkan nyawanya untuk menyelamatkan seorang budak lelaki Hmong dari sebuah perkampungan yang terbakar di utara. Budak itu membesar menjadi Kapten Songkiat, seorang askar yang berjanji setia kepada negara Thai.

programme.title: KL Special Forces
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sekumpulan pasukan unit polis khas yang diketuai oleh Roslan yang telah cuba menjatuhkan kumpulan samun yang diketuai oleh seorang lelaki bernama Asyraff. Geng itu digelar 'Geng Anarkis' dan terkenal dengan rancangan dan taktik bijak mereka dalam rompakan bank untuk mengelirukan polis. Pada masa yang sama seorang anggota polis muda bernama Zul telah diambil untuk menyertai pasukan khas. Keadaan menjadi lebih rumit apabila Asyraff, ketua kumpulan samseng itu menjeling untuk memanipulasi fikiran kedua-dua Roslan dan Zul. Pada masa yang sama, Roslan berdepan masalah dalam perkahwinannya kerana sukar untuk mengimbangi keluarga dan pekerjaan. Zul mengalami masalah yang sama dengan tunang yang kebetulan anak kepada pemilik Bank Damofa yang menjadi sasaran utama perompak kumpulan itu. Rahsia gelap akan terbongkar apabila mereka bergerak untuk rompakan seterusnya? Adakah pasukan unit khas mampu menjatuhkan Asyraff?

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Seorang pengawal peribadi yang malang dipecat oleh anak pelanggannya kerana kematian bapa pelanggannya. Anak lelaki itu kemudian diburu oleh pembunuh upahan yang tidak mahu dia mewarisi syarikat bapanya.

programme.title: Siccin 2
programme.desc: Adnan dan Hicran selamat berkahwin namun apabila anak lelaki mereka meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan misteri Adanan menjadi jauh daripada isterinya. Hicran mula menyiasat masa lalunya untuk melihat bagaimana ia boleh dikaitkan dengan kematian anaknya.

programme.title: Barajiwa Ep.2 Ep2
programme.desc: Uzair menyerang Madi dengan ganas. Madi dimasukkan ke hospital dalam keadaan koma, Uzair dihantar untuk pemulihan. Uzair menumpukan perhatian kepada SPM. Dia pergi untuk melindungi Ajeeb daripada Hatta yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pergaduhan. Imran membalas dendam terhadap Uzair dengan memanipulasi Asyikin untuk menjadi GRO.

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Echa kembali tenang setelah dia diserang histeria sekolah. Halim bersama Maya bergegas pulang bila mendapat panggilan dari Nina. Halim sempat telefon Mat minta bantuan. Nina yang sudah tidak tahan apa yang berlaku, mahu berpindah dari situ. Tetapi berjaya dipujuk Maya dengan beberapa cadangannya. Halim memanggil beberapa orang surau untuk memulihkan rumahnya.

programme.title: 666 Cin Musallati
programme.desc: Memenangi hidupnya dengan menulis skrip filem seram, Gurkan pergi ke Kayakoy, Fethiye, di mana peristiwa paranormal dialami dalam laporan akhbar. Nihal kehilangan keluarga. Memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai ahli psikologi kepada Nihal. Dia mendapati dirinya berada di tengah-tengah peristiwa yang menakutkan. Sekarang satu-satunya sebab adalah untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Bunohan
programme.desc: 3 abang pulang ke kampung Bunohan dengan tiga alasan yang sangat berbeza; mereka akan menemui kematian, penipuan dan wahyu yang sangat suram.

programme.title: Operasi X
programme.desc: ASP Redzuan sudah tidak percaya lagi dengan pegawai polis lain apabila dia menyaksikan kematian rakan baiknya, Inspektor Aman, yang dipercayai dibunuh oleh pihak polis. Dia kemudian memutuskan komunikasi dengan semua orang dan mula tinggal di sebuah pulau terpencil, menyembunyikan identitinya daripada penduduk di situ. Tetapi SAC Dato' Mokhtar dan DSP Anwar dari Bukit Aman dapat menjejakinya. Dia kemudian ditugaskan untuk mengetuai operasi yang dinamakan Operasi X untuk menumpaskan Geng Belut

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Echa kembali tenang setelah dia diserang histeria sekolah. Halim bersama Maya bergegas pulang bila mendapat panggilan dari Nina. Halim sempat telefon Mat minta bantuan. Nina yang sudah tidak tahan apa yang berlaku, mahu berpindah dari situ. Tetapi berjaya dipujuk Maya dengan beberapa cadangannya. Halim memanggil beberapa orang surau untuk memulihkan rumahnya.

programme.title: Busut Bonang
programme.desc: Joey, pemilik rancangan televisyen "Merungkai Misteri", telah dipanggil ke Kampung Bonang untuk menyiasat misteri kematian ngeri Cikgu Hassan. Berikutan kematiannya, penduduk kampung mendakwa rohnya kelihatan berkeliaran di kampung mencari pengganti baru. Pada masa yang sama, anak perempuannya Julia sering tidak sihat sekarang kerana diganggu oleh makhluk ghaib. Untuk membersihkan nama Cikgu Hassan, Joey menculik Lufty, seorang lelaki yang tanpa disedari terlibat dalam perkara ini semasa mencari pekerjaan, untuk menjadi krunya semasa siasatan. Misteri semakin mendalam apabila Joey dan Lufty, disertai Julia, diganggu oleh semangat Penunggu Busut ketika dalam perjalanan ke Busut dan mereka tersesat.

programme.title: Rambo Last Blood
programme.desc: John Rambo, setelah melawan iblisnya selama puluhan tahun, kini hidup dalam kedamaian di peternakan keluarganya di Arizona. Namun, ketenangannya terganggu ketika Gabriela, cucu dari pembantu rumahnya Mara, menghilang setelah menyeberangi perbatasan ke Meksiko untuk bertemu dengan ayah kandungnya. Rambo, yang telah menjadi figur ayah yang sejati bagi Gabriela selama bertahun-tahun, memulai perjalanan yang putus asa dan berbahaya untuk menemukannya.

programme.title: Bunohan
programme.desc: 3 abang pulang ke kampung Bunohan dengan tiga alasan yang sangat berbeza; mereka akan menemui kematian, penipuan dan wahyu yang sangat suram.

programme.title: The Secret Suster Ngesot Urban
programme.desc: Mengetahui bahawa bapanya telah berkahwin dengan seorang wanita sebayanya, Kanaya meninggalkan rumah, hanya untuk mengalami kemalangan yang menyebabkan dia di hospital berhantu.

programme.title: Laddaland
programme.desc: Apabila sebuah keluarga berpindah ke Laddaland, sebuah pembangunan perumahan mewah dengan rumah yang besar dan cantik, mereka mendapati kehidupan di kawasan kejiranan baharu mereka tidak begitu sempurna apabila mereka menghadapi satu siri peristiwa paranormal yang menakutkan yang mendorong keluarga itu ke pinggir kegilaan.

programme.title: Maama Machan
programme.desc: Ketua kampung menolak perkahwinan cinta di kampung. Tapi, apa yang dia akan buat bila dapat tahu anak dia sendiri tengah bercinta?

programme.title: Janet: Sumpahan Terlarang
programme.desc: Julia adalah gadis Sarawak yang pergi ke Kuala Lumpur untuk merancang perkahwinannya Farid. Tetapi dia secara tidak sedar menggunakan jepit rambut milik Janet, yang telah menjadi korban ritual dalam membina jambatan.

programme.title: The Lake
programme.desc: Seorang kanak-kanak membawa balik telur aneh, sehingga menyedari bahawa ia adalah telur raksasa. Ia muncul dari tasik dan membunuh semua orang di seluruh bandar.

programme.title: Check In Shock
programme.desc: Sekumpulan orang berkumpul di hospital terbiar untuk mengambil bahagian dalam rancangan realiti. Sesiapa yang berjaya bermalam di tempat yang dikatakan berhantu akan memenangi hadiah wang tunai. Apabila malam semakin larut, sesetengah daripada mereka mula mengesyaki bahawa penganjur tidak bercadang untuk membenarkan sesiapa pergi dengan ganjaran. Kebenaran ternyata lebih mengancam apabila roh yang menghantui tempat itu terbukti benar dan mula menyerang mereka.

programme.title: The Presence
programme.desc: Aom dihantui mimpi ngeri yang tidak dapat dijelaskan. Semasa melawat neneknya, dia mendapat tahu bahawa neneknya yang kelihatan lebih mati daripada hidup sedang melayan dan memberi makan kepada hantu. Adakah Aom akan menerima nasibnya?

programme.title: Barajiwa Ep.2 Ep2
programme.desc: Uzair menyerang Madi dengan ganas. Madi dimasukkan ke hospital dalam keadaan koma, Uzair dihantar untuk pemulihan. Uzair menumpukan perhatian kepada SPM. Dia pergi untuk melindungi Ajeeb daripada Hatta yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pergaduhan. Imran membalas dendam terhadap Uzair dengan memanipulasi Asyikin untuk menjadi GRO.

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: Seorang budak lelaki yang boleh melihat hantu berpindah ke sebuah bandar kecil, di mana dia berkawan dengan hantu perempuan. Kedua-duanya bekerjasama untuk menyiasat hantu bertopeng yang membunuh pelajar seorang demi seorang.

programme.title: Taxi 4
programme.desc: Tidak bernasib baik, kikir, tetapi menawan, detektif PD Marseille milien Coutant-Kerbalec mesti membantu komisioner Gibert yang lebih teruk daripada Clouseau menjaga penjenayah Belgium yang terkenal sebagai bahaya sama seperti - dan ditawan seperti Hannibal Lector. Kawan sejuk milien, pemandu teksi Daniel Morales, pada mulanya hanya bersetuju untuk menjaga anak-anak lelaki kawan mereka, kerana isteri milien, Petra, sedang menjalankan misi rahsia. Tetapi tidak lama kemudian, penjenayah Belgium itu melarikan diri, dan semasa mengejarnya, rakan-rakan itu tersandung pada satu perampokan bank dan sebuah vila megah milik raja dadah, di mana babak akhir yang hebat berlaku.

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Mengisahkan hidup Sherry yang sering dikongkong oleh bapanya. Hal ini membuatkan jiwa Sherry memberontak dan ingin mencari kebebasan dalam hidup. Sherry kemudiannya jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Roy. Namun, bapa Sherry tidak merestui cinta mereka dan tidak membenarkan Sherry untuk keluar daripada rumah lagi. Dengan bantuan Zul, bapa Sherry merancang sesuatu untuk merenggangkan hubungan Sherry dengan Roy. Tetapi Roy dan Sherry membalasnya dengan satu penculikan palsu untuk menyedarkan bapa Sherry tentang erti kasih sayang yang sebenar.

programme.title: Nana Tanjung
programme.desc: Seorang duda bernama Nana Kassim membesarkan tiga orang anak perempuannya di Pulau Pinang. Seorang pemuda bernama Akhbar Khan jatuh cinta dengan Khairunisa, anak sulung Nana. Akhbar sanggup menjadi pengawal peribadi Nana untuk selalu berjumpa kekasihnya itu. Pada masa yang sama dia mendapat tahu bahawa Nana mempunyai rancangan lain untuk perkahwinan Khairunisa. Untuk meyakinkan Nana supaya mereka boleh mengahwini pasangan pilihan masing-masing, Akhbar bersama anak-anak Nana memujuknya supaya berkahwin dengan Mami Mumtaz, kekasih lamanya.

programme.title: Tesis
programme.desc: Azira menemani Fatin ke negeri Pahang untuk menyiapkan kajian tesisnya tentang industri pelancongan di sana. Ketika membuat rakaman di sebuah pantai, mereka ternampak dua orang lelaki membuang tubuh seorang wanita ke dalam laut. Mereka berdua kemudiannya dikejar oleh penjahat itu namun dapat melepaskan diri dan segera membuat laporan polis tentang kejadian itu. Fatin yang masih ketakutan itu ingin pulang ke Kuala Lumpur namun Azira meyakinkannya bahawa keadaan mereka selamat dan polis akan memberi bantuan sekiranya mereka diganggu. Seperti yang Fatin jangka, penjahat itu kini mengekorinya sehingga dia dan Fatin melarikan diri ke dalam hutan. Tanpa disedari, mereka berdua telah terperangkap dalam satu sindiket.

programme.title: 4 Madu
programme.desc: Azlan, seorang pekerja biasa di sebuah chalet telah menerima surat yang memintanya hadir ke pejabat guaman di Kuala Lumpur. Setibanya di ibu kota, Azlan telah diperkenalkan dengan adik tirinya, Azrul untuk pertama kali dalam hidupnya. Di pejabat guaman itu, Encik Zahrin Ishak membacakan wasiat yang ditinggalkan oleh arwah ayah mereka. Segala harta yang bernilai 50 juta ringgit akan menjadi hak milik mereka sekiranya mereka dapat memenuhi syarat-syarat yang terkandung dalam wasiat itu. Antara perkara yang perlu dilaksanakan ialah, mereka berdua harus mencari isteri dalam tempoh 3 minggu serta calon isteri itu mestilah seorang anak yatim piatu.

programme.title: Sepi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tiga orang yang berasingan mengenal erti cinta, kehilangan dan kesepian. Adam, seorang tukang masak terkenal yang meluaskan kerjayanya dengan mereka hiasan untuk majlis perkahwinan. Tetapi, dengan segala kejayaan itu beliau masih membujang dan belum bertemu jodohnya sendiri. Sufi pula seorang lelaki yang sedang cuba melenyapkan memori kematian isterinya. Akhir sekali, Iman, seorang penulis muda yang menjadikan pentas teater sebagai tapak untuk memahami masa silamnya dan kupasan demi kupasan ke dalam masa depannya sendiri. Ketiga-tiga watak ini akhirnya terkait dalam satu insiden dramatik yang akan merubah kehidupan mereka buat selamanya.

programme.title: Buli
programme.desc: Nordin sering dibuli oleh Roy sejak zaman kanak-kanak lagi. Dia yang kini seorang pereka perisian komputer membesar dengan keyakinan diri yang rendah namun bertekad untuk tidak lagi ditindas. Dia sering mengalami mimpi-mimpi dengan senario yang aneh. Nordin kemudiannya bertemu dengan Dr. Ika yang ingin membantunya. Pelbagai insiden terjadi yang akhirnya telah mengubah hidup Nordin dan pembulinya.

programme.title: Siapa Tak Sayang Bini
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kekalutan dua keluarga iaitu Kassim, seorang suami yang garang dan suka mengawal isterinya, Kamisah dan juga Karim, seorang suami yang lembut hati namun dikawal isterinya yang garang, Kasmah. Segalanya bermula apabila Kassim berpindah ke sebelah rumah Karim. Pasangan kaki kontrol cuba menjadi guru dengan mengajar pasangan masing-masing. Keadaan menjadi bertambah kecoh dengan kehadiran Saiful, lelaki bujang yang suka menyibuk hal orang lain. Siapakah yang berjaya mengawal pasangan masing-masing?

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jeff, Aida dan Ben yang gemar menipu orang untuk mendapatkan wang di Kuala Lumpur. Mereka kemudiannya diupah oleh seseorang untuk mendapatkan saham di sebuah syarikat. Sasaran mereka kali ini ialah Nora, seorang wanita yang baru menjadi pengurus di syarikat itu. Pelbagai kejadian lucu berlaku semasa Jeff mendekati Nora sehingga mereka berdua jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Sepi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tiga orang yang berasingan mengenal erti cinta, kehilangan dan kesepian. Adam, seorang tukang masak terkenal yang meluaskan kerjayanya dengan mereka hiasan untuk majlis perkahwinan. Nordin kemudiannya bertemu dengan Dr. Ika yang ingin membantunya. Pelbagai insiden terjadi yang akhirnya telah mengubah hidup Nordin dan pembulinya.

programme.title: Sayang Anakku Sayang
programme.desc: Lima beradik yang menjadi anak yatim piatu setelah kehilangan kedua ibu bapanya. Terpaksa berpisah dan diambil oleh keluarga angkat, abang sulung mereka teringat akan janji arwah ibunya untuk menjaga adik-adiknya lalu dia pergi mengambil mereka semula. Dibantu majikan bapanya yang terhutang budi, mereka berlima akhirnya bersama semula setelah diambil sebagai anak angkatnya.

programme.title: Chantek
programme.desc: Chantek, seorang pembantu rumah dari Indonesia yang terpaksa menyamar sebagai lelaki untuk menenteramkan AD yang masih fobia dengan perempuan. Lama-kelamaan kerana kebaikan AD dan kemesraan mereka berdua, Chantek terpaksa mendedahkan rahsianya. Walaupun marah, AD sedia memaafkannya kerana kejujuran Chantek membantu memulihkannya dan akhirnya mereka berdua telah jatuh cinta. Namun hati Chantek berubah setelah dia terasa dipergunakan oleh AD sebagai bahan latihan filemnya. Berjayakah AD bertemu dan memenangi hati Chantek kembali?

programme.title: Karipap Karipap Cinta
programme.desc: Ali bekerja sebagai jurufoto di syarikat penerbitan majalah jatuh hati kepada Sarah, seorang lulusan Universiti Al-Azhar. Ali panik apabila rakan serumahnya memberitahu keluarga Sarah ingin menjodohkannya dengan seorang ustaz. Untuk memenangi hati Sarah dan keluarganya, Ali terpaksa berbohong dengan mengatakan dia juga merupakan seorang graduan Universiti Al-Azhar. Dalam masa yang sama bos Ali, Dato' Razali Bunari cuba mendedahkan satu skandal yang turut melibatkan bapa Sarah.

programme.title: Usop Wilcha Menghonjang Makhluk Muzium
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sebuah muzium yang ingin mengadakan satu pameran Hantu-Hantu Dunia untuk menarik minat pengunjung. Tanpa disedari, penganjuran pameran ini mempunyai matlamat tersendiri. Melalui perancangan licik sekumpulan pengamal ilmu hitam dari Romania, pameran ini sebenarnya ingin menghidupkan kembali Raja Dracula. Mengikut kepercayaan kumpulan ini, Raja Dracula akan dapat hidup kembali dengan mendapatkan darah manusia dari setia

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Mengisahkan hidup Sherry yang sering dikongkong oleh bapanya. Hal ini membuatkan jiwa Sherry memberontak dan ingin mencari kebebasan dalam hidup. Keadaan menjadi bertambah kecoh dengan kehadiran Saiful, lelaki bujang yang suka menyibuk hal orang lain. Siapakah yang berjaya mengawal pasangan masing-masing?

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jeff, Aida dan Ben yang gemar menipu orang untuk mendapatkan wang di Kuala Lumpur. Mereka kemudiannya diupah oleh seseorang untuk mendapatkan saham di sebuah syarikat. Sasaran mereka kali ini ialah Nora, seorang wanita yang baru menjadi pengurus di syarikat itu. Pelbagai kejadian lucu berlaku semasa Jeff mendekati Nora sehingga mereka berdua jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Sayang Anakku Sayang
programme.desc: Lima beradik yang menjadi anak yatim piatu setelah kehilangan kedua ibu bapanya. Terpaksa berpisah dan diambil oleh keluarga angkat, abang sulung mereka teringat akan janji arwah ibunya untuk menjaga adik-adiknya lalu dia pergi mengambil mereka semula. Dibantu majikan bapanya yang terhutang budi, mereka berlima akhirnya bersama semula setelah diambil sebagai anak angkatnya.

programme.title: 4 Madu
programme.desc: Azlan, seorang pekerja biasa di sebuah chalet telah menerima surat yang memintanya hadir ke pejabat guaman di Kuala Lumpur. Setibanya di ibu kota, Azlan telah diperkenalkan dengan adik tirinya, Azrul untuk pertama kali dalam hidupnya. Di pejabat guaman itu, Encik Zahrin Ishak membacakan wasiat yang ditinggalkan oleh arwah ayah mereka. Segala harta yang bernilai 50 juta ringgit akan menjadi hak milik mereka sekiranya mereka dapat memenuhi syarat-syarat yang terkandung dalam wasiat itu. Antara perkara yang perlu dilaksanakan ialah, mereka berdua harus mencari isteri dalam tempoh 3 minggu serta calon isteri itu mestilah seorang anak yatim piatu.

programme.title: Dosa Yang Tak Diiktiraf
programme.desc: Razif dan Rita Sarafina, adalah pasangan suami isteri yang bergiat dalam industri muzik. Nama mereka gah dalam arena Rock tanah air. Razif ditugaskan untuk mencipta sebuah lagu berunsur keagamaan yang masih ada unsur rock dengan gabungan alunan irama nasyid untuk sebuah OST filem. Dia mula terkesan dengan skrip filem itu yang menyedarkan dia tentang hukum agama. Sejak itu Razif mula mempelajari tentang agama dan telah meninggalkan kesan terhadap keluarganya apabila mereka juga turut disuruh meninggalkan dunia hiburan.

programme.desc: Bedu,12, mempunyai IQ yang tinggi walaupun dia nampak lurus. Arwah ayah Bedu meletakkan harta semua kepada Bedu manakala separuh harta lagi diserahkan kepada ibunya Thalia. Maria merasakan dirinya masih muda dan tidak gemar apabila dinasihati Nora, rakan baiknya, mengenai solat dan pemakaian yang menutup aurat. Bagi Maria, kematian itu masih jauh lagi. programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: Our School'S E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep508
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep5455
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep63
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep958959
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep733
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3435
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep104
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4928
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: Powerful, insane and obsessed with hatred, the bride with white hair has gone on a killing rampage, and can only be stopped by the one person she loves.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin Bei Xing before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in 1960s and 70s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Airlift
programme.desc: Ranjit Katiyal, an Indian businessman, leads a happy and successful life in Kuwait with his family. However, when Iraq invades Kuwait, he decides to risk his life to save his stranded countrymen.

programme.title: Rangoon

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaners - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey reveal the secrets behind production on an epic scale. This time they discover how a humble but hardy 'Henry' the vacuum cleaner is produced.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Berlin - Joanna continues her travels to Berlin. A sometimes dark history has given birth to a creative city with a thrilling atmosphere.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Tour a building that once fuelled the Victorian era but is now a busy retail complex, then eye a Viennese gasometer that has become a shining example of communal living.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Mauritius - In this episode Robson heads to Mauritius - a country famous for honeymooning couples - but he's going to fish.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - Clash of the Alphas Ep3
programme.desc: Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoors poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bees Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Rajan Monkey on a Mission Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesnt look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Grass is Greener Ep2
programme.desc: Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - Clash of the Alphas Ep3

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 4 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when theyre done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote whos enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Temple Monkeys on the Run Ep8
programme.desc: Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman Langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Ocean Oddballs Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into the lives of the oceans weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fishs eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Creepiest Crawlies Ep5
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Nagaina: Queen of Kings Ep9
programme.desc: In the hot, and humid tropical forests of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission. She needs to find a mate, find food and lay her eggs, all before the monsoon arrives in 5 months time. Shes not the only one, for lots of animals in the jungle, this is breeding season, where males vie for the attention of females in the hope of finding a mate. Will they all get what they want and secure the next generation before the rains set in?

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Mountains Ep4
programme.desc: Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2020
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2020!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep12
programme.desc: Full House / Gift Express - Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Edens fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harpers family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep34
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky Penny / Hammys Day Out - Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now its up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep35
programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities.
